description: Enterprise techniques used by VERMIN, ATT&CK software S0257 v1.1
name: VERMIN (S0257)

techniques.comment: [VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) uses HTTP for C2 communications.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) encrypts the collected files using 3-DES.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) can perform audio capture.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) saves each collected file with the automatically generated format {0:dd-MM-yyyy}.txt .(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) collects data stored in the clipboard.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) decrypts code, strings, and commands to use once it's on the victim's machine.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) can delete files on the victim’s machine.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) can download and upload files to the victim's machine.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) collects keystrokes from the victim machine.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) is obfuscated using the obfuscation tool called ConfuserEx.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) is initially packed.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) can get a list of the processes and running tasks on the system.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) can perform screen captures of the victim’s machine.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) uses WMI to check for anti-virus software installed on the system.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) collects the OS name, machine name, and architecture information.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) gathers the local IP address.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
[VERMIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0257) gathers the username from the victim’s machine.(Citation: Unit 42 VERMIN Jan 2018)
